name: Bomber Together
description:
You wake up and find yourself in a strange factory, where the Foreman needs help dealing with a... monster?

Find out what he's really up to in this short but cute, story-driven puzzle game!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
E - Interact
Q - Switch character (some levels)
R - Reset puzzle
M - Main menu

Notes:

This game was made in 7 days for the Brackeys Jam 2021.1

The theme was 'Stronger Together'

This is the first time we have done a 7 day jam and we wanted to try some things that were new to us! We had never made a game which relies heavily on narrative before, and this theme seemed perfect to experiment with that! It's also our first puzzle game, but the narrative was the main focus, so the puzzles aren't particularly unique or innovative.

Windows, Mac, and Linux builds offered but not tested.

We hope you enjoy it!

Emmarrdi & Melusyn
(Pie Gulp Games)
